org.apache.fop.fonts.truetype

Class OFDirTabEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fop.fonts.truetype.OFDirTabEntry

  • public class OFDirTabEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an entry to a TrueType font's Dir Tab.
